.
What Constitutes a MOD Claim
Consider any communication from the surviving spouse requesting the Veteran’s benefit for the MOD as a claim for payment for the MOD under
38 U.S.C. 5101
.
Notes
:
Telephone or written communications are included in this stipulation.
Document telephone requests on
VA Form 27-0820,
Report of
General Information
.
Exception
:  A claim for payment of MOD may not be required when guidance in the
M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, 2.1.c
is applicable.
